Game như cặc

Well. 

Im gonna keep this very short. Speaking of GTA Online. 
First of all. After what, 8 years since release. Its still ALWAYS 1-10 people that obviously cheat and hack per server. 
Rockstar is TOTALLY UNCOMMITED to fixing this. Totally. They don't even seem to have ONE employee monitoring tickets, nor servers or players. Since I can't even recall when playing on a server without cheaters online unless im alone at server, im figuring its all free to cheat. Since nobody get banned. If people actually got banned we would probably see less to none cheaters since people in general don't rebuy the game 10 times to be able to cheat. 

Other than that it's also supergrindy and most things you "invest" in, probably take about a few hundreds of active gamehours to make up for the value invested. So all in all, its supergrindy, and you cant even do online missions because unless you get fuc*ed over by people that comes in tanks or fighterjets and what not, you will definietely get killed during your missions from someone that cheats and can like insta-kill you with bombs from wherever on the map. 

Its ridiculus that GTA dont have lower rating, i presume most players only play online when they have finished single player? I dont see that from the rating though. I cant understand that people spend money in Online since its unplayable and totally free to cheat/hack. Obviously Rockstar dont care at all, as long as they make money. 

On a last note, instead of adding weird stuff to buy and imbalance pay to win kind of vehicles/weapons, maybe focus on opening up more buildings, adding more activities or developing the game in general. Or just I dont know, keep on moneygrabbing but at least make a better GTA 6.

Its sad, feels like they really dont give a shit, really frustrating putting money into a game to get ravaged EVERY time you login by hackers. Wow! 

My two cents.
